name: E-commerce Platform
core_entities: Product | SKU | Cart | Order | Payment | User | Inventory
critical_features: Inventory Locking | Payment Gateway Webhooks | Cart Persistence | Search & Filtering
2025_standard: Sử dụng 'Outbox Pattern' cho xử lý đơn hàng. Tích hợp Vector Search cho 'Semantic Product Search' (tìm kiếm theo ý nghĩa).

name: B2B SaaS Application
core_entities: Tenant | Organization | User | Subscription | Role | Permission | AuditLog
critical_features: Multi-tenancy Isolation | RBAC/ABAC Authorization | Subscription Lifecycle (Stripe/LemonSqueezy)
2025_standard: Dùng 'Row-Level Security (RLS)' trong Postgres để cô lập dữ liệu Tenant. Hỗ trợ SSO/SAML mặc định.

name: Digital Wallet / Banking
core_entities: Wallet | Transaction | Ledger | Currency | Beneficiary | KYCProfile
critical_features: Double-entry Bookkeeping (Kế toán kép) | Idempotency Keys | Fraud Detection | Audit Trails
performance_bottleneck: High contention on Hot Wallet accounts
2025_standard: Bắt buộc dùng 'Idempotency Keys' cho mọi API giao dịch. Log thay đổi data ra bảng Audit riêng không được sửa xóa (Append-only).

name: Social Network / Community
core_entities: User | Post | Comment | Reaction | Follower | Feed | Notification
critical_features: Fan-out on Write (Feed generation) | Graph Relationships | Media Processing | Real-time Notifs
2025_standard: Dùng Graph Database hoặc Recursive CTE cho quan hệ bạn bè. Feed nên dùng Redis/Cassandra. Ảnh/Video xử lý async qua Queue.

name: Chat / Messaging App
core_entities: Room | Message | Participant | Device | Attachment | ReadReceipt
critical_features: WebSocket Managment | Message Persistence | Offline Sync | Presence System (Online/Offline)
2025_standard: Dùng mô hình Actor (Elixir/Akka) để quản lý state từng Room. Lưu tin nhắn vào ScyllaDB/Cassandra để scale write cực cao.

name: AI Agent / RAG System
core_entities: Agent | Thread | Message | DocumentChunk | Embedding | Tool
critical_features: Vector Search (Similarity) | Context Window Management | Streaming Response | Tool Execution Sandbox
2025_standard: Dùng pgvector hoặc Qdrant. Streaming response từ server về client là bắt buộc. Lưu history hội thoại vào NoSQL để linh hoạt schema.

name: IoT / Telemetry Dashboard
critical_features: High-frequency Ingestion | Data Downsampling | Real-time Alerting
2025_standard: Không dùng bảng SQL thường cho log sensor. Dùng TimescaleDB hoặc ClickHouse. Dùng UDP/MQTT cho ingestion.

name: Two-sided Marketplace
core_entities: Buyer | Seller | Listing | Booking/Order | Review | Payout
critical_features: Escrow Payments (Giữ tiền) | Calendar/Availability Sync | Geo-spatial Search
2025_standard: Xử lý kỹ logic 'State Machine' cho đơn hàng (Pending -> Confirmed -> Completed). Geo-hashing (PostGIS) cho tìm kiếm địa điểm.

name: Streaming / Content Platform
core_entities: Video | Playlist | Channel | Subscription | StreamKey | TranscodeJob
critical_features: HLS/DASH Streaming | CDN Integration | DRM Protection | Video Transcoding
2025_standard: Dùng Signed URLs (CloudFront/S3) để bảo vệ nội dung. Transcoding chạy trên Serverless/Worker (AWS MediaConvert).

name: Booking / Reservation System
critical_features: Concurrency Control (Optimistic Locking) | Timezone Management | Slot Generation
2025_standard: Sử dụng 'Optimistic Locking' (version column) để tránh đặt trùng chỗ. Lưu thời gian chuẩn UTC.

name: Learning Management System (LMS)
core_entities: Course | Module | Lesson | Enrollment | Progress | Quiz | Certificate
critical_features: Progress Tracking | Video Streaming | Automated Grading | Scorm Compliance
2025_standard: Tính toán tiến độ học tập nên chạy async background job. Cấu trúc dữ liệu cây (Tree) cho mục lục khóa học.

name: CRM System
core_entities: Lead | Contact | Deal | Pipeline | Activity | Note | Integration
critical_features: Custom Fields (EAV or JSONB) | Email Sync | Reporting | Workflow Automation
2025_standard: Dùng cột JSONB cho các trường tùy chỉnh (Custom Fields) để tránh EAV anti-pattern. Tích hợp ElasticSearch cho full-text search hồ sơ.

name: Analytics Platform
critical_features: Columnar Storage | Batch Processing | Real-time Aggregation
2025_standard: Tuyệt đối không dùng Row-oriented DB (MySQL/Postgres) cho bảng Events. Dùng ClickHouse hoặc DuckDB. Pre-aggregate dữ liệu cho dashboard.

name: Logistics / Delivery App
core_entities: Order | Driver | Vehicle | Route | LocationPing | Zone
critical_features: Real-time Geo-tracking | Route Optimization | Dispatch Algorithm
2025_standard: Dùng Redis Geo hoặc Uber H3 index cho tracking vị trí tài xế. Thuật toán điều phối (Matching) cần xử lý trên Memory.

name: Web Crawler / Scraper
critical_features: IP Rotation | Rate Limiting | Headless Browser Management | CAPTCHA Solving
2025_standard: Quản lý Queue job chặt chẽ (Redis Streams). Sử dụng Headless Browser pool cẩn thận để tránh leak memory.
